de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.spacefillingcurves

Class AbstractSpatialSorter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.spacefillingcurves.AbstractSpatialSorter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpatialSorter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinarySplitSpatialSorter, HilbertSpatialSorter, PeanoSpatialSorter, ZCurveSpatialSorter

    public abstract class AbstractSpatialSorter
extends Object
implements SpatialSorter
    Abstract base class for spatial sorters, offering shared functionality.
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • sort

        public <T extends SpatialComparable> void sort(List<T> objs)
        Description copied from interface: SpatialSorter
        Partitions the specified feature vectors
        Specified by:

        Type Parameters:

      • pivotizeList1D

        protected <T extends SpatialComparable> int pivotizeList1D(List<T> objs,
                                               int start,
                                               int end,
                                               int dim,
                                               double threshold,
                                               boolean desc)
        "Pivotize" the list, such that all elements before the given position are less than, all elements after the position are larger than the threshold value in the given dimension. (desc inverts the sorting!) Only the elments in the interval [start: end[ are sorted!
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object type
        Parameters:
        objs - List of objects
        start - Start of sorting range
        end - End of sorting range
        dim - Dimension to sort by
        threshold - Threshold value
        desc - Inversion flag
        Returns:
        Pivot position

                         int s,
                         int dim)
        Compute getMin(dim) + getMax(dim) for the spatial object.
        Parameters:
        objs - Objects
        s - index
        dim - Dimensionality
        Returns:
        Min+Max

      • computeMinMax

        public static double[] computeMinMax(List<? extends SpatialComparable> objs)
        Compute the minimum and maximum for each dimension.
        Parameters:
        objs - Objects
        Returns:
        Array of min, max pairs (length = 2 * dim)
